description: Deal 10(13) damage. If Fatal, Upgrade a random card in your deck. Exhaust.

name: Master Reality

name: Omniscience

name: Ragnarok
description: Deal 5(6) damage to a random enemy 5(6) times.

name: Scrawl

name: Spirit Shield
description: Gain 3(4)  Block for each card in your hand.

name: Vault
description: Take an extra turn after this one. End your turn. Exhaust.

name: Wish

description:
Heal 4(6) HP.

Exhaust.

name: Blind
description: Apply 2  Weak (to ALL enemies).

Exhaust.

Add 1(2) random Colorless card(s) to your hand.

Exhaust.

name: Madness

Innate.

Deal damage equal to the number of cards in your draw pile.

name: Hand of Greed

name: Master Of Strategy

name: Mayhem

name: Metamorphosis
description: Add 3(5) random Attacks into your Draw Pile. They cost 0 this combat. Exhaust.

name: Panache
description: Every time you play 5 cards in a single turn, deal 10(14) damage to ALL enemies.

name: Sadistic Nature

name: Secret Weapon

name: The Bomb
description: At the end of 3 turns, deal 40(50) damage to ALL enemies.

(Don't Exhaust)
